pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'C3.js' Chart Library // Create interactive charts with the 'C3.js' http://c3js.org/ charting library. All plot types in 'C3.js' are available and include line, bar, scatter, and mixed geometry plots. Plot annotations, labels and axis are highly adjustable. Interactive web based charts can be embedded in R Markdown documents or Shiny web applications.
